about.name: About
about.title: Want to Get to Know Me?
about.content: My name is Loubna Aleksandra Kubiak, and I am a photo artist with Polish roots, based in Norway and working worldwide. I run Loubna Photo, which focuses on traditional darkroom techniques and handcrafted fine art prints. I hold a higher education degree in photography and multimedia communication. As a freelancer, I have worked with magazines, advertising agencies, and private clients, all while pursuing my own artistic projects.

contact.name: Contact
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: I am Loubna, a passionate photographer based in Oslo, Norway. With a keen eye for detail and a love for capturing moments, I specialize in portrait and landscape photography. Through my lens, I strive to tell stories and evoke emotions that last a lifetime.
